message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a high-value item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $1200000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1500000. This is my final counteroffer, so if you're not comfortable with this price, I'll have to explore other options.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I really think $1500000 is a bit high. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $1300000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1400000. This is my last offer, so if you're not comfortable with this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1400000 is too high. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000. This is my final offer.
